formulas.description: Add balance transaction Id to endpoint
formulas.name: StripeBalanceTransactionEndpoint

fields.name: RefundConfirmationText
fields.fieldText:
The following refund will be performed:


Customer:

{!CustomerSObjectList.firstSelectedRow.Customer_Name__c}


Email:

{!CustomerSObjectList.firstSelectedRow.Email__c}


Amount of original transaction:

{!AmountCurrencyFormatted}


Amount to refund:

{!How_much_would_you_like_to_refund_currency}


Return Type:

{!dependent_picklist.topValue}


Return Reason:

{!dependent_picklist.middleValue}


Account Balances:

Available to pay out: {!balanceTransactionAvailableFormatted}

Available soon: {!balanceTransactionAvailableSoonFormatted}


Refund Source:

{!refundSource}

fields.name: Amount_Able_To_Be_Refunded
fields.fieldText:
Amount available to refund:

${!ChargesForCustomer.firstSelectedRow.Available_For_Refund__c}

fields.name: How_much_would_you_like_to_refund_currency
fields.fieldText: How much would you like to refund?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid amount up to ${!ChargesForCustomer.firstSelectedRow.Available_For_Refund__c}

fields.name: Should_transfer_be_reversed
fields.fieldText: Please select an account for payout

fields.name: ChargesSelectedError
fields.fieldText: Please select charges with a refundable amount greater that 0

fields.name: NoRefunds
fields.fieldText: There are no refunds for this charge.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_perform_another_refund
fields.fieldText: Would you like to perform another refund?

fields.name: DisplayRefundedData
fields.fieldText:
Refund Complete.


Customer:

{!CustomerSObjectList.firstSelectedRow.Customer_Name__c}


Email:

{!CustomerSObjectList.firstSelectedRow.Email__c}


Amount of original transaction:

{!AmountCurrencyFormatted}


Amount Refunded:

{!RefundedAmount}


Return Type:

{!dependent_picklist.topValue}


Return Reason:

{!dependent_picklist.middleValue}


Refund Source:

{!refundSource}

fields.name: NoCustomerFound
fields.fieldText: ﻿No customer was found, please enter a different email address.
